import re

def extract_words(sentence):
    delimiter_pattern = ''
    words = re.split(delimiter_pattern, sentence)
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if re.match('^[a-zA-Z-]+$', word)]
    return filtered_words

mutants.original_line: filtered_words = [word for word in words if re.match(r'^[a-zA-Z-]+$', word)]
mutants.mutated_line: filtered_words = [word for word in words if re.match('', word)]
mutants.code:
import re

def extract_words(sentence):
    delimiter_pattern = '[^a-zA-Z0-9-]+'
    words = re.split(delimiter_pattern, sentence)
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if re.match('', word)]
    return filtered_words
